name: Superhuman strength
description: The ability to exert force beyond that of a normal human.

name: Agility
description: The ability to move quickly and easily.

name: Durability
description: The ability to withstand damage or hardship.

name: Leadership
description: The capacity to lead and influence others effectively.

name: Genius-level intellect
description: Exceptional intelligence and cognitive abilities.

name: Master archery
description: Exceptional skill in the use of a bow and arrow.

name: Expert marksmanship
description: Exceptional accuracy and precision in shooting.

name: Regeneration
description: The ability to heal rapidly from injuries.

name: Martial arts mastery
description: Exceptional proficiency in various forms of hand-to-hand combat.

name: Espionage expertise
description: Skill in undercover operations and gathering intelligence covertly.

name: Size manipulation
description: The ability to alter one's size.

name: Flight
description: The ability to fly.

name: Bio-electric blasts
description: The ability to emit blasts of bio-electric energy.

name: Reality manipulation
description: The ability to alter or manipulate reality.

name: Energy manipulation
description: The ability to control and manipulate various forms of energy.

name: Telekinesis
description: The ability to move objects with the mind.

name: Superhuman speed
description: The ability to move at speeds beyond that of a normal human.

name: Control over lightning
description: The ability to generate and manipulate lightning.

name: Mastery of the mystic arts
description: Proficiency in the use of mystical forces and energies.

name: Sling Ring manipulation
description: The ability to create and manipulate portals through space.

name: Time manipulation
description: The ability to control and manipulate the flow of time.

name: Wall-crawling
description: The ability to adhere to and climb vertical surfaces.

name: Spider-sense
description: Enhanced perception that alerts the individual to imminent danger.

name: Skilled combatant
description: Proficient in hand-to-hand combat and combat strategy.

name: Skilled tactician
description: Proficient in devising strategies and tactics.

name: Enhanced strength and agility
description: Increased strength and agility beyond normal human limits.

name: Enhanced durability
description: Increased resistance to damage or injury.

name: Control over flora
description: The ability to manipulate and control plant life.
